description: This is an ESLint configuration file for a Vue.js project using TypeScript, Vitest, and Prettier. It defines rules, plugins, and files to lint or ignore.

methods.name: defineConfigWithVueTs
methods.description: Defines the ESLint configuration with Vue and TypeScript support.

methods.name: vueTsConfigs
methods.description: Contains predefined Vue TypeScript ESLint configurations, including 'recommended'.
